MIA (Modular Image Analysis)

Modular, object-based analysis for ImageJ/Fiji

View on GitHub
Introduction Getting started Modules List of modules Macros Extending MIA
Back to module list

Save image

Description

Parameters

  • Input image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Save location
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Save with input file
    • Choices:
      • Mirrored directory
      • Save with input file
      • Specific location
  • Mirrored directory root
    • Type: FolderPathP
  • File path
    • Type: FolderPathP
  • Append date/time mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Never
    • Choices:
      • Always
      • If file exists
      • Never
  • Add filename suffix
    • Type: StringP
  • Flatten overlay
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: false
ModularImageAnalysis is maintained by SJCross. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
